statements: CREATE TABLE compliance_regulations ( regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, regulation_name STRING, description STRING )
CREATE TABLE compliance_records ( record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, regulation_id INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP, document BLOB, FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES compliance_regulations(regulation_id) );
CREATE TABLE compliance_regulations ( regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, regulation_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents ( document_id INT PRIMARY KEY, document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, regulation_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES compliance_regulations(regulation_id) );
CREATE TABLE compliance_issues ( issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY, issue_description TEXT NOT NULL, document_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES compliance_documents(document_id) );
CREATE TABLE audit_logs (id INT PRIMARY KEY, event_time TIMESTAMP, user_id INT, event_description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE user_profiles (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, full_name TEXT, email TEXT, phone_number TEXT);
CREATE TABLE compliance_policies (policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY, policy_name TEXT, description TEXT);
